comment.author: Christopher
comment.text: Thank you for taking the corrupt, conniving, nasty, vile and ruthless Democratic machine assault with such class and strength. America needs you. Bless you and your family for your courage and tenacity. You will be the finest President America has ever known. Dems have forgotten one very important thing, we're not stupid .

replies.author: Orion
replies.text: Not long until true Americans lock her up!!!

replies.author: Connor
replies.text: "Ask not, what your country can do for you." It's time to save our country folks. Stand in the gap of history. Your vote is your ball and musket. Patriots Vote Trump...

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: Dems are screwed if dems think like you. Seriously wake up folks!!

replies.author: Robert
replies.text: Trump courage? He is a draft dodging coward
